reentrancy.title: Apply Checks-Effects-Interactions and Reentrancy Guard
reentrancy.recommendation: Move state updates before external calls; consider ReentrancyGuard; minimize external calls.

arithmetic_overflow.title: Use Safe Arithmetic and Range Checks
arithmetic_overflow.recommendation: Use Solidity >=0.8 overflow checks or SafeMath for older versions; validate ranges.

access_control.title: Enforce Role-Based Access Control
access_control.recommendation: Restrict privileged functions using onlyOwner/onlyRole modifiers; validate caller permissions.

unchecked_call.title: Check External Call Return Values
unchecked_call.recommendation: Always verify low-level call return values; handle failures explicitly.

dos_gas.title: Mitigate Gas-Related DoS Risks
dos_gas.recommendation: Avoid unbounded loops; prefer pull over push; optimize storage writes.
